channel.title: Server Hosting
channel.description: I chose the server hosting DYNDS. I made a server thing and when I went to create the server I did and I logged on. I lost connection after a while and I could never connect to it again. Why is this so? How do you add members only areas? Thanks.

item.title: Server Hosting
item.dc:creator: @Mopar_Helper Mopar Helper
item.description:
@Mopar_Helper wrote:

if the computer is off no, leave it on with a restarter, like a voule. and for semi dedicated servers, it costs you alot of money per month, its not reccomended but it is very good for popular servers.
Semi dedicated servers DO stay up, but you need to pay a large sum per month, they run if you’re offline i think.

Read full topic
